meanings.sent1: She was a nonpareil singer, captivating the audience with her beautiful voice.
meanings.sent2: The majestic mountain stood as a nonpareil example of nature's grandeur.
meanings.sent3: The nonpareil sunset painted the sky in a breathtaking array of colors.
meanings.sent4: His nonpareil skills in painting left everyone in awe of his talent.
meanings.sent5: The nonpareil beauty of the rare flower made it a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: A person or thing having no equal; a paragon.
meanings.sent1: She was considered a nonpareil in the field of mathematics, solving complex problems effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The legendary warrior was hailed as a nonpareil in battle, never tasting defeat.
meanings.sent3: The nonpareil of the class, he aced every test without breaking a sweat.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness and generosity made her a nonpareil among her peers.
meanings.sent5: The nonpareil of fashion, she always turned heads with her unique style.

meanings.definition: A small flat disc of chocolate covered with white sugar sprinkles.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed the sweet crunch of a nonpareil as a special treat.
meanings.sent2: The bakery displayed a variety of nonpareils in different colors and flavors.
meanings.sent3: The nonpareil added a delightful touch to the dessert, making it visually appealing.
meanings.sent4: The children giggled as they decorated cupcakes with colorful nonpareils.
meanings.sent5: The nonpareil on top of the cake added a festive touch to the celebration.
